text: Shamshernagar Airport is a public use airport southeast of Moulvibazar, Bangladesh. It is operated by Bangladesh Air Force. Due to the short length of the runway it is restricted to STOL aircraft. As of July 2015, no scheduled passenger flights serve the airport, but civil air operations are allowed with prior approval. == References == == Other websites == * Airport record for Shamshernagar Airport at Landings.com ** ASN accident history for ZHM ** SkyVector aeronautical chart for VGSH Category:Airports in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Bangladesh
title: Shamshernagar Airport
